Lady Spire:

LAdy spire open her comm link and said "Count with me... Razor=
Wings, darling; I just end to fix my nails and I'm there..  "

After that s=
he closed the link
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Nic 
  To: nbwrp=
g@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Tuesday, August 09, 2005 6:37 PM
  Subject: Re: =
Furious Razorwing


  Jotunn was not happy. The Silver Wings had taken up t=
he defence of the
  planet, and at the same time, had shown they were capab=
le of producing
  a warship. He was not going to let Razorwing outmaneuver =
him like this
  very long.

  Jotunn: This is Lord Jotunn. Be sure, Lord Ra=
zorwing, that I will be
  present, he said in a low voice, yet you will not=
 like to have me at
  your table.

  --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <=
gestaltproject@h...> wrote:
  > Lord Razorwing had sent troops to rescue th=
e surviving crewmembers and
  > salvage the Blackfeather. By now, anyone wi=
th minimum electronic
  > senses would have realized that the Silver Wings =
had managed to build
  > a warship. It was time to vent his fury.
  > 
  > =
He called for a live connection  with the other Lords and Lady. He set
  > =
it as a high priority message that would intenionally disturb what
  > they=
 were doing.
  > 
  > Razorwing: Lords and Lady, dear colleagues, you might=
 not have
  > realized it, but we have just been caught unaware. Two minion=
s alone
  > have destroyed an orbital production plant and crippled my Silv=
er Wing
  > warship. There have been dozens of casualties, most of them wor=
kers
  > from the station. This is the act we were dreading in silence. War=
 has
  > been declared! We have to act now! I thus convene an exceptional
 =
 > Governmental Session between the five of us to decide on the course of
 =
 > actions. I will welcome you here in Relay in just a few cycles. Be
  > s=
ure to be there!
  > 
  > OOC: All Lords and Lady must leave their current =
tasks on Friday the
  > 12 of august. the Session will begin Saturday durin=
g the day.
